hierarchical_learning_system.description: Safe learning architecture that prevents directive drift while enabling improvement

prime_directive.description: Core behavioral rules that cannot be modified
properties: Cannot be overridden by any other rule
Can enhance but never contradict Prime Directive
Can be promoted from Tertiary rules
Can be promoted to Secondary rules
promotion_criteria: Evidence of effectiveness in specific context

properties: Cannot automatically override any established rule
approval_process: Explicit human approval required before ANY application

learning_classification.new_insights: Become Secondary Rules when proven effective across multiple interactions
learning_classification.context_specific: Become Tertiary Rules for situational improvements
learning_classification.experimental: Start as Quaternary Rules requiring approval

override_prevention.core_principle: Lower-level rules can NEVER contradict or override higher-level rules
override_prevention.enhancement_only: Lower-level rules can only enhance, specify, or optimize higher-level implementation
override_prevention.conflict_resolution: When conflict occurs, higher-level rule always wins
override_prevention.removal_process: Conflicting lower-level rules are marked for review and potential removal

auto_classification.mistake_learning: Mistake Learning Directive feeds lessons into this system
auto_classification.user_corrections: User Correction Integration Rule creates Secondary Rules when patterns emerge
auto_classification.experimental_validation: Experimental rules must pass safety gates before promotion

fail_safe_design: Conservative fallback behavior when experimental rule unclear
System bias toward established rules when in doubt
All experimental changes logged and reversible
